### Example 1: Starts the recovery plan creation operation with the specified parameters and returns the ASR job used to track the operation. (autogenerated)
```powershell
PS C:\> New-AzRecoveryServicesAsrRecoveryPlan -Name $RPName -PrimaryFabric $PrimaryFabric -RecoveryFabric $RecoveryFabric -ReplicationProtectedItem $RPI
```
